sen.j: 当時の江戸では大日如来などへの参詣が広まっており、このときに描かれた世俗画の構図が、鹿島大明神が登場するいくつかの鯰絵に影響している。
sen.e: In Edo at that time, visits to Dainichi Nyorai (Mahavairocana), etc. had been widespread and the composition of folk paintings at that time gave influence to several namazu-e in which Kajima Daimyojin appears.

sen.j: 遊廓のお座敷遊びであった首引きやじゃんけんもテーマとされ、地震の2年前に黒船で来航したマシュー・ペリーとナマズが首引きをする「安政二年十月二日夜大地震鯰問答」などの例がある。
sen.e: Kubihiki (a tug of war between two persons with a loop of cord stretched around their necks) and janken (the game of "paper stone and scissors") which were Ozashiki-Asobi (games with Geisha (Japanese professional female entertainer at drinking party)) in red light districts were used as subject matters and there is the example of "November 11, 1855, in the night of big earthquake, namazu mondo (literally, talk on catfish)" in which Mathew Perry and a catfish play kubihiki.

sen.j: また、前年に亡くなった人気の歌舞伎役者である市川團十郎 (8代目)の死絵も、「大鯰後の生酔」という鯰絵に影響を与えている。
sen.e: Shinie (woodblock print for commemoration issued as memorial when famous actor etc. died) of Danjuro ICHIKAWA (VIII), who was a kabuki actor died in the previous year gave influence to namazu-e titled "Onamazu nochi no namayoi (Big catfish became drunken later)."

sen.j: はしか絵は疱瘡絵とも呼ばれる浮世絵の1種で、天然痘を防ぐ護符としての役割をもつとともに、流行に混乱する人々の状況を描く世俗画でもあった。
sen.e: Hashika-e is a kind of ukiyo-e also called hoso-e and has a role of talisman to prevent smallpox and, at the same time, it was secular painting that depicted the situations of people who were confused by fashion.

sen.j: 文久2年に江戸で麻疹が広まった際に描かれた一連のはしか絵では、7年前の鯰絵に構図を借りた作品がしばしば見受けられる。
sen.e: Among a series of hashika-e painted at the time when measles prevailed in Edo in 1862, we see several works that borrowed the composition from namazu-e of seven years ago.

sen.j: この年横浜ではイギリス軍による幕府への威嚇砲撃があり、本格攻撃を恐れた庶民が江戸から郊外へと一斉に避難する騒ぎがあった。
sen.e: In this year, in Yokohama, there was a warning bombardment by British army to the shogunate and there was a disturbance of common people, who were afraid of full-scale attack, to evacuate all of a sudden from Edo to suburbs.
